mapper.select: SELECT patient_code, patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_phone, patient_email, patient_sick, patient_admission, department_code FROM tbl_patient
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_patient( patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender, patient_phone, patient_email, patient_sick, patient_admission, department_code ) VALUES ( #{patientName}, #{patientAge}, #{patientGender}, #{patientPhone}, #{patientEmail}, #{patientSick}, #{patientAdmission}, #{departmentCode} )
